video.title: Cheers
video.synopsis: Sam Malone, an ex-baseball player turned bar owner, operates a saloon that's always filled with quirky customers and even more eccentric staff.

episodes.synopsis: Diane is stranded at the bar by her fiancé, who has reunited with his ex-wife. Sam feels sorry for her, and offers her a job at the bar.
episodes.title: Pilot: Give Me a Ring Sometime

episodes.synopsis: Sam is worried that Diane thinks he only dates dumb women, so he tries to impress her with his latest one.
episodes.title: Sam's Women

episodes.synopsis: Carla attacks an especially obnoxious Yankee fan after they beat the Red Sox. He threatens to sue the bar unless Carla is fired.
episodes.title: The Tortelli Tort

episodes.synopsis: Sam is to be interviewed for a sports segment on the news, but doesn't realize he was only chosen because all the big-name players weren't available.
episodes.title: Sam at Eleven

episodes.synopsis: The Cheers crowd is at a loss to find any redeeming qualities in Roy and puzzled that the sweet, successful Lisa would think of marrying such a boor.
episodes.title: Coach's Daughter

episodes.synopsis: One of Diane's old college friends comes to the bar looking for a man to give her an afternoon of unbridled passion. Sam jumps at the opportunity.
episodes.title: Any Friend of Diane's

episodes.synopsis: Norm's anxious to impress his boss at a company party, but didn't expect to be the only one wearing Roman garb in a roomful of his uptight colleagues.
episodes.title: Friends, Romans and Accountants

episodes.synopsis: When the constantly bickering Carla and Diane call a truce over a couple of drinks, Diane loosens up and professes her desire for a friend.
episodes.title: Truce or Consequence

episodes.synopsis: Coach is reticent to reveal his feelings for the younger Nina, but when he confides in Diane, she builds his confidence and urges him to go for it.
episodes.title: Coach Returns to Action

episodes.synopsis: A Red Sox pitcher falls into a slump and asks his idol, Sam, for advice. Sam reluctantly lends his good-luck charm: an old, battered bottle cap.
episodes.title: Endless Slumper

episodes.synopsis: An octogenarian is the only arrival for his WWI squad's reunion at the bar, and an awkward virgin looks for a night of fun before he becomes a monk.
episodes.title: One for the Book

episodes.synopsis: A man visits the bar claiming to be a spy, but Diane exposes him as a fraud. Everyone is mad at her for humiliating him, until he plays a joke on her.
episodes.title: The Spy Who Came in for a Cold One

episodes.synopsis: A sexy, high-powered agent makes Sam an offer he can't refuse. Diane aims to demonstrate that Lana's terms go beyond those written in the contract.
episodes.title: Now Pitching, Sam Malone

episodes.synopsis: Diane becomes upset with everyone at the bar when nobody shows any sympathy after she learns that her family cat has died.
episodes.title: Let Me Count the Ways

episodes.synopsis: After her announcement to Marshall, a smug and satisfied Carla confides the true identity of the father to Diane.
episodes.title: Father Knows Last

episodes.synopsis: When Sam publicly supports an old teammate who has come out of the closet, Norm and the gang are afraid that "Cheers" will become a "gay bar."
episodes.title: The Boys in the Bar

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Diane agree to find blind dates for each other. Diane takes it seriously, but Sam doesn't and finds a disastrous date for her.
episodes.title: Diane's Perfect Date

episodes.synopsis: Diane reluctantly enters the Miss Boston Barmaid contest, but only so she can publicly denounce the competition as sexist and chauvinistic.
episodes.title: No Contest

episodes.synopsis: When Sam learns that a conman has taken thousands of dollars from Coach, he turns to Harry "The Hat" to help them get the money back.
episodes.title: Pick a Con, Any Con

episodes.synopsis: If Diane isn't married within 24 hours, her upper-crust mom will lose her inheritance, so Mrs. Chambers urges her daughter to temporarily marry Sam.
episodes.title: Someone Single, Someone Blue

episodes.synopsis: Sam's brother, whom he feels inferior to, shows up at the bar and sweeps Diane off her feet. Sam doesn't have the guts to admit he wants Diane.
episodes.title: Show Down: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Sam's brother, whom he feels inferior to, shows up at the bar and sweeps Diane off her feet. Sam doesn't have the guts to admit he wants Diane.
episodes.title: Show Down: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Diane's new relationship together gets off to a shaky start, which comes as no surprise to anyone at the bar.
episodes.title: Power Play

episodes.synopsis: Cliff falls for Carla's innocent-looking younger sister, who is sitting in for Carla while she has her baby, but she isn't as naive as she looks.
episodes.title: Lil' Sister Don't Cha

episodes.synopsis: Carla complains that Diane is getting preferential treatment as the boss's girlfriend, and decides the time has come to seek a new challenge.
episodes.title: Personal Business

episodes.synopsis: Against Sam's better judgment, Diane tries to help her former homicidal blind date, Andy, become an actor.
episodes.title: Homicidal Ham

episodes.synopsis: Diane doesn't tell Sam that she is going out to dinner with her ex-fiancé and his wife because she thinks he will embarrass her if he comes along.
episodes.title: Sumner's Return

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Diane try to stop Carla from sleeping with her new boyfriend after they learn that he has a heart condition.
episodes.title: Affairs of the Heart

episodes.synopsis: Sam's old broadcaster buddy, Dave, predicts that Sam and Diane will be broken up in the next 24 hours. Then, he sets out to make sure that it happens.
episodes.title: Old Flames

episodes.synopsis: Gentle Coach turns into a tyrant obsessed with winning when he manages a Little League team. Diane tries to show him and Sam the error of his ways.
episodes.title: Manager Coach

episodes.synopsis: Dick Cavett encourages Sam to write a book about his playing days, and Diane helps him do it. Norm's old rival for Vera wants to make a move on her.
episodes.title: They Call Me Mayday

episodes.synopsis: Sam casually tells Diane he loves her and sends her deep into an introspective analysis of their relationship.
episodes.title: How Do I Love Thee?  Let Me Call You Back

episodes.synopsis: Sam thinks Diane's oldest and best friend is hitting on him. Diane knows better, but becomes paranoid after Carla eggs her on.
episodes.title: Just Three Friends

episodes.synopsis: After receiving a dismal prognosis from his doctor, Kramer drops by Cheers to enjoy the camaraderie. It's later learned he willed $100,00 to the bar.
episodes.title: Where There's a Will

episodes.synopsis: Sam agrees to be Carla's date for her ex-husband Nick's wedding. But Sam makes Nick jealous, and causes him to ask Carla to take him back.
episodes.title: Battle of the Exes

episodes.synopsis: Sam hires unemployed Norm to do his taxes, but he comes to regret his kind act when the results threaten to destroy their friendship.
episodes.title: No Help Wanted

episodes.synopsis: The omnipresent Coach is oblivious to the fact that he's interfering with Sam and Diane's love life, and they decide Coach needs a woman.
episodes.title: Coachie Makes Three

episodes.synopsis: A man in the bar becomes sick of Cliff's obnoxious know-it-all behavior and challenges him to a fight. Will Cliff accept the challenge or run away?
episodes.title: Cliff's Rocky Moment

episodes.synopsis: Coach purchases an antique scale that also delivers fortunes, and the Cheers clan begins to attribute supernatural powers to the scale.
episodes.title: Fortune and Men's Weights

episodes.synopsis: Sam says he's going to Vermont for a funeral, but Diane knows he's really going on a ski weekend with his buddies.
episodes.title: Snow Job

episodes.synopsis: Coach accidentally finds out that his recently-deceased friend once made a pass at his wife.
episodes.title: Coach Buries a Grudge

episodes.synopsis: Norm considers cheating on Vera with a sexy new client who apparently has the hots for him.
episodes.title: Norman's Conquest

episodes.synopsis: A jealous Diane agrees to have her portrait taken by an arrogant, eccentric artist, even though Sam can't stand the guy and forbids her to do it.
episodes.title: I'll Be Seeing You: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Diane follows through with getting her portrait painted behind Sam's back. But the artist predicts that if Sam sees it, she'll never see him again.
episodes.title: I'll Be Seeing You: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Sam falls off the wagon and Diane has a breakdown after the breakup. But after she's cured, Diane returns to Cheers to recommend her psychiatrist.
episodes.title: Rebound: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Diane tells Sam that she's seeing Frasier. Then, they both say they no longer have feelings for each other, though both suspect the other is lying.
episodes.title: Rebound: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Frasier tells Sam that the girlfriend of one his "clients" called out another man's name in bed, but Sam knows he's talking about Diane.
episodes.title: I Call Your Name

episodes.synopsis: Cliff meets the woman of his dreams at the bar on Halloween night but is afraid of meeting her when he's not in costume.
episodes.title: Fairy Tales Can Come True

episodes.synopsis: Sam accidentally shoots himself in the rear after a confrontation with a jealous husband, but he changes the story to make himself look like a hero.
episodes.title: Sam Turns the Other Cheek

episodes.synopsis: Coach falls in love and gets engaged. But when his fiancée wins the lottery, her feelings toward him take an unexpected turn.
episodes.title: Coach in Love: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Coach's fiancée calls off the wedding and dumps him. But he's convinced that it's not over and that she will come back to him on their wedding day.
episodes.title: Coach in Love: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: After their first meeting, Frasier's mother warns Diane that if she continues to see Frasier, she will kill her.
episodes.title: Diane Meets Mom

episodes.synopsis: Carla tries to stand up to Nick when he demands custody of their first-born son, which means not giving in to his surprisingly irresistible charm.
episodes.title: An American Family

episodes.synopsis: Diane claims to be allergic to Frasier's dog after they move in together, but Sam and Frasier know her allergies are psychosomatic.
episodes.title: Diane's Allergy

episodes.synopsis: After a health scare, Norm gives up his old life and says he's moving to Bora Bora. But he chickens out at the last minute and hides in Sam's office.
episodes.title: Peterson Crusoe

episodes.synopsis: Diane warns Sam not to go out with a friend she met at the mental hospital because she has obsessive issues with men. Sam doesn't heed the warning.
episodes.title: A Ditch in Time

episodes.synopsis: Much to Frasier's horror, his psychiatry mentor becomes involved with Carla and asks her to marry him.
episodes.title: Whodunit

episodes.synopsis: Diane gets mad at the guys when they take Frasier on a "snipe hunt." But she also doesn't want Frasier to know they played a trick on him.
episodes.title: The Heart Is a Lonely Snipehunter

episodes.synopsis: After his shameful performance in a charity softball game against a team of Playboy Playmates, Diane confronts Sam about his over-competitive nature.
episodes.title: King of the Hill

episodes.synopsis: Sam gets Coach's help to pass a geography class and get his high school diploma. But he eventually finds an easier way to pass the course.
episodes.title: Teacher's Pet

episodes.synopsis: Norm gets in trouble with the law after he helps Cliff out by finishing his mail route. Meanwhile, Diane gets stuck while checking the heating system.
episodes.title: The Mail Goes to Jail

episodes.synopsis: Sam has to find a woman named Jacqueline Bisset and marry her so that he can win a bet he made when he was off the wagon and keep the bar.
episodes.title: Bar Bet

episodes.synopsis: Sam makes plans for a romantic getaway with a local journalist. But Diane overhears parts of his conversations and jumps to an incorrect conclusion.
episodes.title: Behind Every Great Man

episodes.synopsis: After Loretta dumps Nick, he performs odd jobs around the bar for Sam in an effort to try to win Carla back.
episodes.title: If Ever I Would Leave You

episodes.synopsis: Norm gets a promotion as a "corporate killer," but he's not sure that he can handle being the guy at the office who fires people.
episodes.title: Executive's Executioner Hines

episodes.synopsis: Diane announces that she is leaving Cheers forever to go to Europe with Frasier.
episodes.title: Cheerio, Cheers

episodes.synopsis: Sam hires a waitress that Carla considers to be a perfect replacement for Diane: she's smart, charming and Sam doesn't want to sleep with her.
episodes.title: The Bartender's Tale

episodes.synopsis: Carla believes that one of her customers is her old evil Catholic school principal, and she wants to get revenge on her.
episodes.title: Bells of St. Clete's

episodes.synopsis: Diane calls Sam to tell him that she is marrying Frasier tomorrow, and Sam flies to Italy at the last minute to stop the wedding.
episodes.title: Rescue Me

episodes.synopsis: Sam couldn't stop the wedding, but Frasier tells him that Diane left him at the altar and is now working at a convent.
episodes.title: Birth, Death, Love and Rice

episodes.synopsis: The Cheers gang flies Woody's old girlfriend in from Indiana to visit, and it becomes obvious that they use binge eating to curb their sexual urges.
episodes.title: Woody Goes Belly Up

episodes.synopsis: Through a strange twist of fate, Diane meets a cultured, intelligent man who appears to be perfect for her, but she thinks he's not attractive enough.
episodes.title: Someday My Prince Will Come

episodes.synopsis: Sam accidentally convinces Carla's son Anthony to get married. Cliff is convinced that he's grown a potato that looks like Richard Nixon.
episodes.title: The Groom Wore Clearasil

episodes.synopsis: Diane dreams that "Andy Andy" has escaped from an institution and is coming to kill her. But when she wakes up, he's at the bar to ask a favor.
episodes.title: Diane's Nightmare

episodes.synopsis: Sam loans Diane $500 to buy a book autographed by Ernest Hemingway. She later gives the book to Sam as collateral until she pays back the loan.
episodes.title: I'll Gladly Pay You Tuesday

episodes.synopsis: The guys at the bar feel sorry for Carla because nobody responded to her personal ad. So they send romantic responses from a fictional airline pilot.
episodes.title: 2 Good 2 Be 4 Real

episodes.synopsis: Norm's neighbor tells him that she suspects Vera is having an affair with her husband, and Sam apologizes for degrading Diane on a call-in radio show.
episodes.title: Love Thy Neighbor

episodes.synopsis: After suffering a humiliating loss to Gary's Olde Town Tavern in softball, the gang at Cheers challenges their rivals to a bowling tournament.
episodes.title: From Beer to Eternity

episodes.synopsis: Cliff bonds with his long-lost father until he learns the reason why he came to see him. Sam suspects that Diane intentionally sabotaged his date.
episodes.title: The Bar Stoolie

episodes.synopsis: Diane uses Sam as a case study for a paper in her human sexuality class, but she paints an unflattering picture of him.
episodes.title: Don Juan Is Hell

episodes.synopsis: Sam's good intentions backfire on him when he doesn't place a risky $1,000 bet for Woody with his bookie, only to have Woody win his bet.
episodes.title: Fools and Their Money

episodes.synopsis: Sam donates his old Red Sox jersey for a public television auction, but is humiliated when nobody bids on it.
episodes.title: Take My Shirt...Please

episodes.synopsis: Diane plays a prank on the guys in the bar, but she becomes paranoid as she waits for their inevitable payback.
episodes.title: Suspicion

episodes.synopsis: Diane convinces Sam to go to Frasier with fake depression symptoms so that Frasier can analyze him and get his confidence back as a psychiatrist.
episodes.title: Triangle

episodes.synopsis: Diane rejects Cliff's request to be his date for the postman's ball, so he asks Carla, who will go for a price. But what happens if Diane reconsiders?
episodes.title: Cliffie's Big Score

episodes.synopsis: Sam sets up Frasier with one of his young bimbos. The day after their first date, Frasier announces that they are getting married -- today.
episodes.title: Second Time Around

episodes.synopsis: Norm is up for a promotion at work when he finds out that his competitor is having an affair with their boss's wife.
episodes.title: The Peterson Principle

episodes.synopsis: Sam suffers a hernia while trying to prove that he's not getting too old.
episodes.title: Dark Imaginings

episodes.synopsis: Carla turns to Sam as a partner to go up against Nick and Loretta in a dance competition.
episodes.title: Save the Last Dance for Me

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Diane have a harrowing near-death experience as passengers on a plane flown by one of Diane's ex-lovers.
episodes.title: Fear Is My Co-Pilot

episodes.synopsis: The guys at the bar feel guilty for constantly teasing Diane, so they try to make it up to her by taking her to her favorite opera.
episodes.title: Banditos (aka Diane Chambers Day)

episodes.synopsis: Sam hires a new bartender and appoints himself as host-manager of Cheers. But his new strategy goes belly-up and he is forced to return to the bar.
episodes.title: Relief Bartender

episodes.synopsis: Sam begins dating a city councilwoman who is running for reelection, but Diane is convinced that she will dump him after the election.
episodes.title: Strange Bedfellows: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Councilwoman Eldridge tells Sam to fire Diane because she's insecure about having one of Sam's former lovers working at the bar.
episodes.title: Strange Bedfellows: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Councilwoman Eldridge presses Sam for a marriage proposal, but Sam remains noncommittal. She then dumps Sam after he and Diane create a scene.
episodes.title: Strange Bedfellows: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Diane won't accept Sam's proposal over the phone because she wants him to do it right. So he sets up a romantic evening, only to have her reject him.
episodes.title: The Proposal

episodes.synopsis: Sam refuses to accept Diane's reconsideration of his proposal, and brags to her about a romantic weekend he has planned in Cape Cod.
episodes.title: Cape Cad

episodes.synopsis: Cliff sees dollar signs in his future when he successfully schemes to get his mom engaged to a wealthy bar patron. However, his plan soon backfires.
episodes.title: Money Dearest

episodes.synopsis: Diane thinks that Frasier is masking romantic feelings for his colleague, Dr. Lilith Sternin, so she launches a plan to fan the flames of love.
episodes.title: Abnormal Psychology

episodes.synopsis: Carla finds out that the house she bought was built on top of a 17th-century graveyard. Cliff comes over to help with her first night in the house.
episodes.title: House of Horrors With Formal Dining and Used Brick

episodes.synopsis: Diane brags to Sam about dating other men, namely Chad. Sam feigns indifference in front of her. Meanwhile, Norm is now a financial counselor.
episodes.title: Tan n' Wash

episodes.synopsis: Woody is determined to mix a new drink. However his concoctions are either an existing drink or taste like sewer water.
episodes.title: Young Doctor Weinstein

episodes.synopsis: Diane is doing some part-time teaching at the college and tells Sam that one of her students is falling in love with her.
episodes.title: The Knights of Scimitar

episodes.synopsis: Diane is among a select few graduate students one of her professors has asked to spend Thanksgiving with his family, in the pilgrim tradition.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving Orphans

episodes.synopsis: Diane receives what she believes is a "promising" rejection letter from a literary magazine, but Sam aims to prove it's just a form letter.
episodes.title: Everyone Imitates Art

episodes.synopsis: When Sam goes on vacation, Woody holds down the fort. Woody's prepared to do so, but unprepared for the Dear John letter he receives from Beth.
episodes.title: Book of Samuel

episodes.synopsis: Diane admits to the gang that she has been taking a ballet class at the local community college under the tutelage of world renowned Madame Lihkova.
episodes.title: Dance, Diane, Dance

episodes.synopsis: Diane waltzes into the bar full of cheer, announcing to Sam that she had a premonition that he would ask her to marry him today; he mocks her.
episodes.title: Chambers vs. Malone

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Diane announce to the gang at the bar that they are engaged, but Carla goes into deep denial which she finally comes out of.
episodes.title: Diamond Sam

episodes.synopsis: Diane and Carla console Loretta, who has caught Nick cheating on her. They counsel her to stand on her own two feet and leave Nick.
episodes.title: Spellbound

episodes.synopsis: Eddie Lebec, a newly acquired goalie for the Bruins, comes into the bar prior to a game and it leads to a winning streak he doesn't want to jinx.
episodes.title: Never Love a Goalie: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Carla and Eddie are now in a relationship. Ever since Carla blew him a kiss and Eddie let in a cheap goal, Eddie has been in a slump.
episodes.title: Never Love a Goalie: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: For the bachelor party the guys at the bar throw for Sam, Woody offhandedly asks Diane if she would be the girl who jumps out of the cake.
episodes.title: One Last Fling

episodes.synopsis: On his postal route, Cliff is bitten by a dog and decides to sue the owner for $200,000. The dog's owner ends up being a beautiful, voluptuous woman.
episodes.title: Dog Bites Cliff

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Lilith are moving in together, and as the instigators of the relationship, they invite Sam and Diane over as their first dinner guests.
episodes.title: Dinner at Eight-ish

episodes.synopsis: Diane asks a Frasier's colleague, a world-renowned marriage counselor, to provide a session for her and Sam, and the doctor agrees.
episodes.title: Simon Says

episodes.synopsis: Coach's niece, Joyce, comes to Boston for college. She comes to the bar bearing a letter from her father -- Coach's younger brother -- for Sam.
episodes.title: The Godfather, Part III

episodes.synopsis: Norm announces that he has a great new job at a prestigious CPA firm. Although happy for him, everyone at the bar razzes Norm about the job.
episodes.title: Norm's First Hurrah

episodes.synopsis: After Woody's Uncle Fergie is mugged, Woody's father thinks Boston is too dangerous and urges Woody to return home to Indiana.
episodes.title: Cheers: The Motion Picture

episodes.synopsis: Diane finds the perfect house for her and Sam to buy, but after hearing stories from the old couple that lives there, she thinks they should keep it.
episodes.title: A House is Not a Home

episodes.synopsis: Diane's professor ex-fiancé tells her he submitted one of her old unfinished novels to an editor at a publishing house, who sees promise in it.
episodes.title: I Do, Adieu

episodes.synopsis: Things at Cheers have changed. Sam sold the bar to a large corporation and bought a boat. Woody and Carla are forced to wear corporate uniforms.
episodes.title: Home is the Sailor

episodes.synopsis: Dave Richards is looking for a replacement television sportscaster to fill his position and thinks Sam would be the perfect person.
episodes.title: 'I' on Sports

episodes.synopsis: A week after Carla tells Eddie that she's pregnant with his child, Eddie walks into the bar and asks her to marry him.
episodes.title: Little Carla, Happy at Last: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Eddie and Carla's wedding is off because Mama LeBec doesn't approve of her intended daughter-in-law. Eddie thinks he can't go against Mama.
episodes.title: Little Carla, Happy at Last: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is feeling pressured by Lilith to get married, and he doesn't like it. He wants to be the man in the relationship and make the decisions.
episodes.title: The Crane Mutiny

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca cuts off unemployed Norm for being unable to pay his tab. Sam convinces her to give Norm a job, ultimately deciding on painting her office.
episodes.title: Paint Your Office

episodes.synopsis: Frasier finds out some juicy information about Rebecca from her college days: She was the party girl on campus and her nickname was "Backseat Becky."
episodes.title: Last Angry Mailman

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca plans a bachelor auction at the bar to raise money. She doesn't ask Sam to be one of the bachelors, but asks Woody to be in the auction.
episodes.title: Bidding on the Boys

episodes.synopsis: Woody begins dating an older woman he meets while dressed up as Mark Twain.
episodes.title: Pudd'n Head Boyd

episodes.synopsis: Frasier's latest paper is attacked by a noted colleague, then he comes down with an uncontrollable case of the hiccups.
episodes.title: A Kiss is Still a Kiss

episodes.synopsis: Cliff has bought himself a new condo in a singles building. He starts dating Sally from the building, and the guys at the bar are anxious to meet her.
episodes.title: My Fair Clavin

episodes.synopsis: Christmas Eve is depressing at Cheers as Sam rushes to find Rebecca a gift and Rebecca makes everyone work late.
episodes.title: Christmas Cheers

episodes.synopsis: Woody claims that an unidentified guy wearing a white shirt in an episode of "Spenser: For Hire" is him, but everyone doubts his story.
episodes.title: Woody for Hire Meets Norman of the Apes

episodes.synopsis: Woody takes the fall when Rebecca breaks a vase at an important party she organized for her boss. Cliff gets into the mail order shoe business.
episodes.title: And God Created Woodman

episodes.synopsis: Carla gives birth to twins, which causes some waitressing issues at the bar. Sam decides to hire Carla's daughter-in-law, Annie, who falls for Sam.
episodes.title: Tale of Two Cuties

episodes.synopsis: Evan Drake invites Sam and a date onto his yacht for the weekend, implying that it should be Rebecca since Sam and Rebecca are supposedly together.
episodes.title: Yacht of Fools

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Lilith's wedding is nearing, and Sam and Rebecca are throwing them each a bachelor/bachelorette party.
episodes.title: To All the Girls I've Loved Before

episodes.synopsis: Evan Drake is in Europe and has hired Norm to paint his house, so Norm tells Rebecca that she can come over and look around the bedroom.
episodes.title: Let Sleeping Drakes Lie

episodes.synopsis: Carla wants to visit Eddie, who gets a job in an ice skating production after being cut by the Bruins, but she's afraid to fly to Seattle.
episodes.title: Airport V

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca is upset that Evan Drake has promoted Sam to an executive position at corporate, and thinks something is fishy about the promotion.
episodes.title: The Sam in the Gray Flannel Suit

episodes.synopsis: Woody, Sam and Carla go into Rebecca's office asking for a raise, but Rebecca confesses she can't afford it. So Woody suggests a raffle to raise cash.
episodes.title: Our Hourly Bread

episodes.synopsis: Carla learns she's going to be a grandmother and feels old, so Lilith and Rebecca throw her a slumber party to make her feel young again.
episodes.title: Slumber Party Massacred

episodes.synopsis: The gang celebrates their second anniversary of beating Gary's Olde Town Tavern in bowling, but Gary reignites their war by stealing the trophy.
episodes.title: The Bar Wars

episodes.synopsis: Sam's out to prove that he's still got it and Woody's out to prove that he's hot, so they compete to see which one can kiss Rebecca first.
episodes.title: The Big Kiss Off

episodes.synopsis: Evan wants to speak to Rebecca about something important. She thinks it's to tell her that he loves her, but he's actually got much different news.
episodes.title: Backseat Becky, Up Front

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca is still smarting from Evan Drake's departure to Japan, but she accepts a date proposal from Sam, who's the new manager of Cheers.
episodes.title: How to Recede in Business

episodes.synopsis: Sam is called by former lover named Denise who wants to see him as soon as possible, and she has news that makes Sam worried.
episodes.title: Swear to God

episodes.synopsis: Woody has some honeybees delivered to the bar and keeps them in the office. Rebecca has another pest to deal with: her new boss, Martin Teal.
episodes.title: Executive Sweet

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca is still in a quandary over what to do about the marriage proposal from her boss, Martin Teal. Sam goes to Mexico to help open a new bar.
episodes.title: One Happy Chappy in a Snappy Serape

episodes.synopsis: Eddie is back in Boston with the ice show, and with the show comes a beautiful German skater who is notorious for dating her male partners.
episodes.title: Those Lips, Those Ice

episodes.synopsis: The Cranes are impressed with Norm's skills as an interior decorator and recommend him to friends, who expect Norm to be gay.
episodes.title: Norm, Is That You?

episodes.synopsis: Cliff decides to change his personality when nobody visits him in the hospital. Lilith asks Sam to help her learn how to drive.
episodes.title: How to Win Friends and Electrocute People

episodes.synopsis: Woody, Norm and Cliff decide try skydiving, but they chicken out at the last minute and agree to tell everyone at the bar they went through with it.
episodes.title: Jumping Jerks

episodes.synopsis: Sam gets a call from an old flame and is excited to see that she's still beautiful. But her grown daughter also catches Sam's eye.
episodes.title: Send in the Crane

episodes.synopsis: Cheers is in competition with Gary's Old Towne Tavern once again. This time, it's the annual Bloody Mary contest, open to all bars in the Boston area.
episodes.title: Bar Wars II: The Woodman Strikes Back

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is nervous about a speech he has to make, so Carla suggests he picture his audience naked. Rebecca has to housesit for a company executive.
episodes.title: Adventures in Housesitting

episodes.synopsis: Cliff has to train a new postal employee, and he's not too happy about a rookie getting in his way. However, he changes his tune when he meets her.
episodes.title: Please Mr. Postman

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca is asked by one of the corporate bigwigs to organize a party. Woody gets in a fight at the party, then dates his rival's girlfriend.
episodes.title: Golden Boyd

episodes.synopsis: Frasier and Lilith become drawn to Carla's intelligent, cultured son Ludlow. Sam lends his car to Woody for a date with Kelly, then goes along.
episodes.title: I Kid You Not

episodes.synopsis: Sam tells his new girlfriend that he's really into working out, and she totally exhausts him. Rebecca helps Norm with his new painting business.
episodes.title: Don't Paint Your Chickens

episodes.synopsis: Lilith and Frasier decide to move to the woods to raise their child, but they don't like it. Woody is forced to take a vacation to Italy.
episodes.title: The Cranemakers

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca is in a panic when the $32,000 borrowed diamond earrings that she had left in a tumbler in her office go missing.
episodes.title: Hot Rocks

episodes.synopsis: Sam hits on a beautiful woman in the bar, who promptly shoots him down. He learns she's a colleague of the Cranes and fakes a condition to see her.
episodes.title: What's Up, Doc?

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca is looking to Lilith as her new role model in getting ahead in the business world. Woody needs to find an outstanding birthday gift for Kelly.
episodes.title: The Gift of the Woodi

episodes.synopsis: Despite Rebecca's concern about its legality, Sam organizes a basketball betting pool. Eddie forgets his and Carla's anniversary.
episodes.title: Call Me Irresponsible

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca's estranged sister, Susan, is in Boston to shoot a commercial. Sam takes an interest in Susan and attempts to get her and Rebecca to make up.
episodes.title: Sisterly Love

episodes.synopsis: One of Frasier's colleagues is in town to promote his latest book about marital fidelity, and Rebecca accuses him of hitting on her.
episodes.title: The Visiting Lecher

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca asks Frasier and Lilith for some free advice concerning dreams she's having about Sam, and Sam overhears.
episodes.title: The Improbable Dream: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca is swept off her feet by Robin Colcord just as a relationship with Sam is getting started, and Sam can't compete with Robin's lavish gifts.
episodes.title: The Improbable Dream: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Sam is reevaluating his life in light of the fact that Rebecca has chosen Robin Colcord, and he decides to buy a bar that needs a rebirth.
episodes.title: A Bar Is Born

episodes.synopsis: Cliff gets scared when Margaret comes back from Canada and wants to start a relationship. Rebecca looks into getting plastic surgery.
episodes.title: How to Marry a Mailman

episodes.synopsis: Sam is trying to save money to buy back the bar, and Rebecca suggests he sell his beloved Corvette. Norm needs help motivating his employees.
episodes.title: The Two Faces of Norm

episodes.synopsis: Lilith spoils Rebecca's elaborately planned celebration of Cheers' 100th anniversary by going into labor.
episodes.title: The Stork Brings a Crane

episodes.synopsis: Eddie dies in a freak accident during his skating show, and Carla learns he was leading a double life when another wife shows up to his funeral.
episodes.title: Death Takes A Holiday on Ice

episodes.synopsis: To memorialize Eddie, Carla tries to get his number retired by the Bruins. Frasier has reservations about his son's impending bris.
episodes.title: For Real Men Only

episodes.synopsis: When Sam comes into work with facial hair, the guys decide to have a beard-growing contest. Woody gets a role in "Our Town," and Kelly gets jealous.
episodes.title: Two Girls for Every Boyd

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to spice up her relationship with Robin, Rebecca waits for him naked in his apartment. The guys teach Woody how to play Monopoly.
episodes.title: The Art of the Steal

episodes.synopsis: Norm fights off the advances of her secretary, Doris. Rebecca thinks Robin hid a ring in the desk he gave her. Woody wins a trip to Hawaii.
episodes.title: Feeble Attraction

episodes.synopsis: Sam is still aiming to buy back the bar, but doesn't have enough money. Sam takes Robin's place in a regatta and needs to hire a crew.
episodes.title: Sam Ahoy

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca's old college professor and mentor, Alice Ann Volkman, comes to the bar and ends up sleeping with Sam. Carla gets audited by the IRS.
episodes.title: Sammy and the Professor

episodes.synopsis: Cliff appears on "Jeopardy!" and builds up a big lead in the first round, but has trouble hanging on to his advantage. Sam's "black book" is missing.
episodes.title: What Is Cliff Clavin?

episodes.synopsis: Third wheel Sam ruins Rebecca's plans for a romantic evening with Robin. But Sam's actually looking out for Rebecca's feelings.
episodes.title: Finally!: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Despite being a self-professed womanizer himself, Sam can't support Robin cheating on Rebecca and balks when she goes back to Robin.
episodes.title: Finally!: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Woody meets Kelly's mom for the first time, and is surprised by her behavior. The bar gets a mechanical bull and the guys convince Cliff to ride it.
episodes.title: Woody or Won't He

episodes.synopsis: Cliff has a strange reaction to prescription medication he's taking. Frasier wants to learn how to become more of a "bad boy" for Lilith.
episodes.title: Severe Crane Damage

episodes.synopsis: Robin takes a day off work to spend some romantic time with Rebecca, but he ends up getting into a competition with Sam that takes all day.
episodes.title: Indoor Fun with Sammy and Robby

episodes.synopsis: Carla agrees to an even split of Eddie's estate with his other wife; Woody joins a production of "Hair" but doesn't realize there's a nude scene.
episodes.title: Fifty-Fifty Carla

episodes.synopsis: The gang thinks that Gary's Old Towne Tavern has stolen the Cheers mascot, Tecumseh. But it doesn't turn out to be true, and they fear retribution.
episodes.title: Bar Wars III: The Return of Tecumseh

episodes.synopsis: Norm is the bar's designated driver for a night. Kelly's dad sends her to Europe to break up her relationship with Woody, but Woody goes after her.
episodes.title: Loverboyd

episodes.synopsis: Carla tries dating again, but is haunted by Eddie's ghost. Rebecca goes on a consumer reports show to complain about a leg-shaving device.
episodes.title: The Ghost and Mrs. Lebec

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca asks Sam to spy on Robin and his date. Woody needs a new roommate, and finds a woman from Indiana who seems to be perfect.
episodes.title: Mr. Otis Regrets

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca finds out that Robin's been using her for financial gain, but can't bring herself to turn him in when he asks to escalate their relationship.
episodes.title: Cry Hard

episodes.synopsis: Sam turns Robin in for insider trading to protect Rebecca, and Robin flees the country. The company that owns the bar sells it back to Sam.
episodes.title: Cry Harder

episodes.synopsis: Just as Sam and Rebecca are about to get intimate, Robin bursts in on them and Rebecca wastes no time in going right back to Robin.
episodes.title: Love Is a Really, Really Perfectly Okay Thing

episodes.synopsis: Gary pulls one over on Cheers during a charity basketball match, so the Cheers gang responds by bringing in Celtics star Kevin McHale as a ringer.
episodes.title: Cheers Fouls Out

episodes.synopsis: Sam's having trouble running all the "gizmos" Rebecca installed at the bar, so he hires a manager named Earl to help out, which is well-received.
episodes.title: Rebecca Redux

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca is angry when Robin's ex-girlfriend dishes to the tabloids. Carla is having trouble controlling her sexual urges as an Indian Summer begins.
episodes.title: Where Nobody Knows Your Name

episodes.synopsis: Woody lets Cliff's mom stay with him, and she takes a liking to Woody. Construction annoys the Cheers gang, and Norm gets stuck in the back window.
episodes.title: Ma Always Liked You Best

episodes.synopsis: Norm's favorite restaurant is about to be shut down, much to his dismay. A crew of inmates picking up trash across from Cheers includes Robin.
episodes.title: Grease

episodes.synopsis: Carla helps Rebecca figure out how to pay Robin a conjugal visit in jail. The Cranes are faced with sacrificing work to spend time with their son.
episodes.title: Breaking in Is Hard to Do

episodes.synopsis: A famous New York restaurateur buys Melville's, but he starts meddling in Cheers' business; Kelly sends Woody sexy pictures, but who took them?
episodes.title: Bad Neighbor Sam (aka I Hate Leases to Pieces)

episodes.synopsis: Woody gets a role in a commercial for a veggie drink, but he hates the product. Cliff is miffed when Cheers gets napkins with trivia printed on them.
episodes.title: Veggie Boyd

episodes.synopsis: Cliff and Norm try to drum up some excitement by starting a fight between Frasier and Sam. Woody buys way too much stuff from a home shopping channel.
episodes.title: Norm and Cliff's Excellent Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Kelly returns from France with a man who wants to steal her from Woody. Cliff thinks it's a good idea to have his head cryogenically frozen.
episodes.title: Woody Interruptus

episodes.synopsis: Carla's dying mother wants her to rename one of her children. Unbeknownst to Sam and Rebecca, Woody puts a coupon for a free drink in a coupon book.
episodes.title: Honor Thy Mother

episodes.synopsis: Sam tries to upset the owner of Melville's by dating his daughter. Carla gets freaked out by a foosball table she thinks is possessed.
episodes.title: Achilles Hill

episodes.synopsis: With the jukebox away for repair, Cheers gets a karaoke machine. Rebecca gets drunk at her bridal shower and questions her feelings for Robin.
episodes.title: Days of Wine and Neuroses

episodes.synopsis: On Rebecca's wedding day, Sam tries to remind her of her drunken confession that she doesn't love Robin. Frasier is upstaged by a Righteous Brother.
episodes.title: Wedding Bell Blues

episodes.synopsis: Frasier alters Dickens stories to make them more palatable to the Cheers gang. Rebecca runs off to San Diego but takes Woody's wallet by mistake.
episodes.title: I'm Getting My Act Together and Sticking It in Your Face

episodes.synopsis: Sam's yearly Valentine's Day tryst with a woman named Lauren is put in jeopardy because he injured his back. Rebecca laments her lack of a Valentine.
episodes.title: Sam Time Next Year

episodes.synopsis: John Hill puts the back room up for lease, and Sam and Rebecca fight over it. Carla gets glasses, and the gang gives her grief.
episodes.title: Crash of the Titans

episodes.synopsis: Norm gets Vera a job at Melville's after she gets fired from her other job. The gang makes Frasier do all the work for his own birthday party.
episodes.title: It's a Wonderful Wife

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca wants to open a tea room in the back room, to Sam's dismay. A Weather Channel anchor thinks a letter she gets from Cliff was written by a kid.
episodes.title: Cheers Has Chili

episodes.synopsis: Sam's upset that the "Miss Boston Barmaid" contest being held at Cheers is emphasizing personality over looks. Carla decides to enter.
episodes.title: Carla Loves Clavin

episodes.synopsis: An old baseball rival comes to Cheers and convinces Sam to pitch one more time; the gang adopts a Dalmatian puppy as the bar mascot.
episodes.title: Pitch It Again, Sam

episodes.synopsis: Lilith falls into a deep funk when her favorite lab rat dies. Rebecca starts eating healthy and tries to get the gang to follow in her footsteps.
episodes.title: Rat Girl

episodes.synopsis: Frasier asks Sam to baby-sit Frederick, which doesn't go well. Kelly gets a gig as a waitress at Cheers for a school project.
episodes.title: Home Malone

episodes.synopsis: Lilith and Frasier start to think that Sam is taking too much of an interest in Frederick. Sam realizes he wants a kid of his own.
episodes.title: Uncle Sam Wants You (aka Elvis Ex Machina)

episodes.synopsis: Shelley Long rejoins the rest of the gang for a look back. Instead of meeting in the bar, the cast and crew assemble in front of a live audience.
episodes.title: Anniversary Show: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Shelley Long rejoins the rest of the gang for a look back. Instead of meeting in the bar, the cast and crew assemble in front of a live audience.
episodes.title: Anniversary Show: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Rebecca have decided that they are going to have a baby together, and they each ask the Cranes for help.
episodes.title: Baby Balk

episodes.synopsis: Spurred by Frasier's desire to find his inner "hairy man," Frasier, Sam, Norm and Cliff embark on a spontaneous one-week road trip across America.
episodes.title: Get Your Kicks on Route 666

episodes.synopsis: A retiring psychic wants to bestow her crystal ball on Carla. Woody is stung by a critique of his performance in "Arsenic and Old Lace."
episodes.title: Madame LaCarla

episodes.synopsis: Norm gets hurt while painting at the Cranes' house and must stay there. Carla bets $5 that Rebecca can't take care of an egg for three days.
episodes.title: The Norm Who Came to Dinner

episodes.synopsis: Cliff's girlfriend, Maggie, comes back to Boston and gets along well with his mom. Rebecca wants Sam to wear fertility underwear.
episodes.title: Ma's Little Maggie

episodes.synopsis: Everyone at the bar is questioning Sam and Rebecca's desire to have a baby. Cliff wants to direct a video for Woody.
episodes.title: Unplanned Parenthood

episodes.synopsis: It appears as if Sam's latest prank on Gary's Olde Towne Tavern may have killed Gary. But is Gary just playing a trick on Sam?
episodes.title: Bar Wars V: The Final Judgment

episodes.synopsis: The gang asks Kevin McHale how many bolts are in the court at Boston Garden, and Kevin becomes so consumed by the question he falls into a slump.
episodes.title: Where Have All the Floorboards Gone?

episodes.synopsis: Sam gets mad when Carla complicates his efforts to get back at John Hill. Cliff is asked to reenact a Pony Express run, but he's afraid of horses.
episodes.title: Head over Hill

episodes.synopsis: Woody wants to propose to Kelly, but she's preoccupied with Henri's visa. Frasier resists acupuncture until he sees the beautiful doctor.
episodes.title: A Fine French Whine

episodes.synopsis: Since their attempts to have a baby aren't going well, Rebecca wants to see a fertility doctor with Sam. Frasier works on writing his will.
episodes.title: I'm OK, You're Defective

episodes.synopsis: As they constantly fight due to the stress of not being able to conceive, Sam and Rebecca each dream about how their kid would turn out.
episodes.title: Go Make

episodes.synopsis: Cliff and Norm assist with Frasier's self-help group. Woody gives Sam a haircut. Carla thinks Elvis is going to make an appearance at the bar.
episodes.title: Don't Shoot, I'm the Psychiatrist

episodes.synopsis: Woody's side job as a gravedigger makes him unavailable for an important commitment. Rebecca has to crawl into a vent when the furnace breaks.
episodes.title: No Rest for the Woody

episodes.synopsis: Sam tries to get even with John Hill. Carla's son wants to be a priest. Cliff thinks he's a comedian because his joke is put in a postal newsletter.
episodes.title: My Son, the Father

episodes.synopsis: Sam, Woody, Frasier and Lilith take Frederick to see children's singer Nanny Gee for his birthday. The others are unaware of Nanny and Frasier's past.
episodes.title: One Hugs, the Other Doesn't

episodes.synopsis: Cliff refuses to wear a new postal uniform despite never having seen it. Woody's cousin develops feelings for Rebecca.
episodes.title: A Diminished Rebecca with a Suspended Cliff

episodes.synopsis: The guys have a poker game in the back room and Woody hustles them. Rebecca realizes the bar's liquor license has expired.
episodes.title: License to Hill

episodes.synopsis: Frasier needs a personal trainer, and Sam offers to do it for free. Woody has his head in the clouds after a lavish London vacation with Kelly.
episodes.title: Rich Man, Wood Man

episodes.synopsis: Lilith's overbearing mother is coming to visit, and Frasier wants Lilith to stand up to her. Rebecca wants Sam to ask Norm to pay his bar tab.
episodes.title: Smotherly Love

episodes.synopsis: Lilith asks Frasier to take care of a lab rat, and he promptly loses it. Sam attempts a baseball comeback but doesn't like the younger players.
episodes.title: Take Me out of the Ball Game

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca sees her high school sweetheart. Sam starts a support group for stolen Corvette owners. Kelly wants to spend time with Woody's friends.
episodes.title: Rebecca's Lover ... Not

episodes.synopsis: The new owner of Gary's Olde Towne Tavern reacts poorly to a practical joke. Rebecca gets chosen for a makeover in Redbook magazine.
episodes.title: Bar Wars VI: This Time It's for Real

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Woody try to install a satellite dish at the bar. Norm tells Cliff that Johnny Carson is using Cliff's jokes on the Tonight Show.
episodes.title: Heeeeere's Cliffy!

episodes.synopsis: Woody and Kelly experience last-minute trepidations about getting married -- but this doesn't stop them from a bit of prenuptial hanky panky.
episodes.title: An Old-Fashioned Wedding: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Woody and Kelly experience last-minute trepidations about getting married -- but this doesn't stop them from a bit of prenuptial hanky panky.
episodes.title: An Old-Fashioned Wedding: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca vows to change her life after Woody and Kelly's wedding, including quitting smoking. But her last cigarette sets the bar on fire.
episodes.title: Little Match Girl

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Rebecca prepare for the grand reopening of Cheers. Carla has to be nice at her new job. Kelly and Woody have religious differences.
episodes.title: The Beer Is Always Greener

episodes.synopsis: A slot machine is accidentally sent to the bar, and everyone is winning on it except Rebecca. Norm gets a new job as a beer taster at a brewery.
episodes.title: The King of Beers

episodes.synopsis: Sam catches Rebecca smoking, and thinks she needs a harsh program to help her quit. Henri thinks he's a bigger ladies' man than Sam.
episodes.title: The Magnificent Six

episodes.synopsis: Maggie shows up at Cheers claiming she's pregnant with Cliff's child. Rebecca and Sam decide they need a jingle to use in an ad for the bar.
episodes.title: Do Not Forsake Me o' My Postman

episodes.synopsis: Sam has to hire a bouncer when the bar starts to attract patrons of a closed-down biker bar. Rebecca sees Lilith with another man.
episodes.title: Teaching with the Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Frasier is wallowing in Lilith's announcement that she's leaving him for her colleague, Dr. Pascal, with whom she'll spend a year living in a bubble.
episodes.title: The Girl in the Plastic Bubble

episodes.synopsis: Kelly's dad thinks Woody wants to blackmail him when he's caught in an intimate moment with his brother's wife. Rebecca hosts Thanksgiving at the bar.
episodes.title: Ill Gotten Gaines

episodes.synopsis: Carla and John Hill's relationship goes to a new level when he has a heart attack while they're together. Cliff thinks Hitler lives in his building.
episodes.title: Feelings ... Whoa, Whoa, Whoa

episodes.synopsis: Woody wants Kelly to move into his apartment, while she wants to live in a house her dad bought. Rebecca's father wants her to go back to San Diego.
episodes.title: Daddy's Little Middle Aged Girl

episodes.synopsis: Woody and Kelly get a pig they plan to eat for Christmas dinner, but Rebecca befriends the pig. Sam tries to get his car back.
episodes.title: Love Me, Love My Car

episodes.synopsis: Cliff is hired to videotape an anniversary party at the bar, but the camera battery dies. Frasier asks his young secretary out on a date.
episodes.title: Sunday Dinner

episodes.synopsis: Norm gets audited by the IRS, but can avoid trouble if he sleeps with the agent. The gang gets together to watch old footage of one of Sam's games.
episodes.title: Norm's Big Audit (aka Romancing the Crone)

episodes.synopsis: Robin returns to Cheers and admits he's broke, though he still has feelings for Rebecca. He also may have a large sum of money hidden at the bar.
episodes.title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad Bar

episodes.synopsis: Carla's pregnant daughter decides to marry the baby's father, and insists her own father walk her down the aisle, to Carla's dismay.
episodes.title: Loathe and Marriage

episodes.synopsis: Frasier gets a Dear John letter from Lilith, who is still in the eco-pod and wants a divorce. Frasier and Rebecca end up sharing an emotional moment.
episodes.title: Is There a Doctor in the Howe?

episodes.synopsis: Lilith returns to see Frasier but walks in on him and Rebecca as they are about to make love. Confused, Lilith asks Sam what's been going on.
episodes.title: The Bar Manager, the Shrink, His Wife and Her Lover

episodes.synopsis: Cliff, Norm, Woody and Frasier head off to see a triple feature at a beloved drive-in that's about to close, and Sam tries to find a way to join them.
episodes.title: The Last Picture Show

episodes.synopsis: It's St. Patrick's Day, and Cheers engages in another war of practical jokes with the gang from Gary's Olde Towne Tavern.
episodes.title: Bar Wars VII: The Naked Prey

episodes.synopsis: Sam has no place to sleep while his apartment is being fumigated, so he has to find a place to crash for the night -- not an easy task.
episodes.title: Look Before You Sleep

episodes.synopsis: Disillusioned by politics, Frasier bets the gang that he could get a trained monkey -- or Woody -- to win 10 percent of the votes in an election.
episodes.title: Woody Gets an Election

episodes.synopsis: Carla and the gang at the bar drink too much after Sam makes her a bartender, and she confesses to Sam that she slept with one of the guys.
episodes.title: It's Lonely on the Top

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca connects with Mr. Gaines over their shared love of classical music, and she develops feelings for him. Cliff puts his mom in a nursing home.
episodes.title: Rebecca Gaines, Rebecca Loses: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca connects with Mr. Gaines over their shared love of classical music, and she develops feelings for him. Cliff puts his mom in a nursing home.
episodes.title: Rebecca Gaines, Rebecca Loses: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Though plumbers aren't exactly Rebecca's type, she becomes attracted to the man called into the bar to fix a leaky tap. Sam joins a support group.
episodes.title: The Guy Can't Help It

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Diane reconnect after years apart, and they each attempt to convince the other that their love lives have gone well after their breakup.
episodes.title: One for the Road: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Woody hires Norm for a city job. Cliff gets a promotion. Plumber Don asks Rebecca to marry him. Sam and Diane announce big news at the bar.
episodes.title: One for the Road: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Diane contemplate their future together. Sam returns to the bar for one of the most famous closing scenes in television history.
episodes.title: One for the Road: Part 3
